Department: The department within the company responsible for the expenditure. This helps in understanding which business unit is investing in wellness programs.
Program_Name: The specific name or type of the employee wellness program. This column categorizes the various wellness initiatives.
Allocation_Amount: The amount allocated to each employee wellness program, focusing on mental health in the given quarter. Helps track financial commitment towards employee wellbeing.
Focus_Area: The specific focus area of the wellness program, e.g., mental health, physical health, etc. This describes the core intent of the program.
Quarter: The fiscal quarter for which the data is reported, e.g., Q3 2025. Provides a timeline for the analysis.
Year: The fiscal year for which the data is reported. It is essential for annual performance tracking.
